talents.desc: Increase your maximum Mana by 15 when you pick up a Regeneration Globe.
talents.name: Mana Addict

talents.desc: Passively grants 5% Ability Power. Each Hero takedown increases this bonus by 2% to a maximum of 15%. This bonus Ability Power is reset to 5% on death.
talents.name: Gathering Power

talents.desc: Increases Living Bomb's explosion damage by 75%.
talents.name: Fission Bomb

talents.desc: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 10 (+8 per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 10 (+8 per level) damage and splashing for 50%.
talents.name: Phoenix

talents.desc: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 50%.
talents.name: Flamethrower

talents.desc: Flamestrike also applies Living Bomb to Heroes not already affected by it.
talents.name: Ignite

talents.desc: Activate to instantly restore 400 Mana and increase Ability Power by 15% for 5 seconds.
talents.name: Arcane Power

talents.desc: Heal for 26 (+9 per level) Health when you activate Verdant Spheres.
talents.name: Fel Infusion

talents.desc: Passively grants 5% Ability Power. Each Hero takedown increases this bonus by 2% to a maximum of 15%. This bonus Ability Power is reset to 5% on death.
talents.name: Gathering Power

talents.desc: Increases Living Bomb's explosion damage by 75%.
talents.name: Fission Bomb

talents.desc: After 2 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 300 (+65 per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 150 (+32.5 per level) damage to enemies nearby.
talents.name: Pyroblast

talents.desc: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 50%.
talents.name: Flamethrower

talents.desc: Flamestrike also applies Living Bomb to Heroes not already affected by it.
talents.name: Ignite

talents.desc: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
talents.name: Bolt of the Storm
